Package org.springframework.data.gemfire

Interface AbstractBasicCacheFactoryBean.PdxConfigurer<T>

Type Parameters:
T - parameterized Class type capable of configuring Apache Geode PDX functionality.
All Known Implementing Classes:
CacheFactoryBean.CacheFactoryToPdxConfigurerAdapter, ClientCacheFactoryBean.ClientCacheFactoryToPdxConfigurerAdapter
Enclosing class:
AbstractBasicCacheFactoryBean
public static interface AbstractBasicCacheFactoryBean.PdxConfigurer<T>
Callback interface to configure PDX.
